en.title: ContentStudio AI Pro
en.text: A multi-agent GenAI platform that creates blog posts, social media content, ad copy, and more in seconds. It features real-time content generation, brand voice training, and analytics dashboards to track SEO and readability scores.

en.title: TextGenix Enterprise
en.text: An AI-powered intelligent document processing system! This platform enhances and transforms documents (PDF, DOCX, TXT, HTML, RTF) with context-aware vocabulary improvements, grammar validation, and industry-specific terminology (legal, medical, financial, technical). It comes with a sleek Gradio-based web interface featuring modern styling, interactive analytics dashboards, and real-time quality metrics like semantic preservation, grammar score, and AI confidence levels.

en.title: AI Summarization Platform
en.text: In just a few seconds, this system can transform long PDFs, Word documents, text files, or even live URLs into succinct, useful summaries. In addition to handling intelligent chunking, citation extraction, entity recognition, and exporting results in PDF, DOCX, Excel, JSON, or XML, it supports a variety of AI models, including GPT-4 Turbo, Claude 3.5, LLaMA 3, local models, and more.

en.title: Quantum Hardware Noise Simulator & Mitigation Visualizer
en.text:
This interactive platform simulates realistic quantum hardware noise across multiple architectures (IBM Lagos, Google Sycamore, IonQ Aria) and applies advanced error mitigation techniques like Zero-Noise Extrapolation (ZNE) and Probabilistic Error Cancellation (PEC).

The system provides:

üìä Visual comparison of ideal vs noisy quantum circuits (Bell, GHZ, QFT, Random)

üîç Hardware-specific error heatmaps and coherence time scaling

üõ†Ô∏è Customizable noise parameters (gate errors, readout errors, T1/T2 scaling)

en.title: WealthWise Agent
en.text:
An AI-driven personal finance planning web app that helps individuals manage their money smarter. It applies the 50/30/20 budgeting rule (needs, wants, savings) while allowing customization, supports multiple financial goals, and suggests real-time investment opportunities.

With a sleek dark-themed Gradio interface, WealthWise Agent not only calculates your budget but also provides step-by-step reasoning, structured JSON output, and interactive charts for better financial visualization.
